articles.contents:
Sydelle de Souza
          
          
          Home
          About
          My Work
          â˜°
          
          
      
        
          
            Tobi Burns
          
          
            
              I am a classically trained data scientist living in the
              San Francisco Bay Area. Currently I work on the Oculus
              team at Facebook. I love talking about baseball, true
              crime podcasts, and causal inference.

articles.title: Hi! I'm Syd
articles.description: Welcome to the website. I hope you enjoy it!
articles.contents:
Current Positions
Doctoral Researcher in Natural Language Processing
School of Informatics, University of Edinburgh (2022-2026)
- 4-year PhD with Integrated Study funded by the UKRI Centre for Doctoral Training in NLP
- Supervisors: Professor Jennifer Culbertson & Dr.Â Francis Mollica
- Affiliations: Institute for Language, Cognition and Computation, Centre for Language Evolution
Researcher, Integrated Member (without PhD)
Centre for Linguistics, University of Lisbon (2020-present)
Education
MSc Psychological Research (Distinction)
University of Edinburgh (2021-2022)
School of Philosophy, Psychology & Language Sciences
- Area of Specialization: Psychology of Language
- Supervisors: Professor Jennifer Culbertson & Dr.Â Francis Mollica
MSc Applied Linguistics & Second Language Acquisition (Distinction)
University of Oxford (2020-2021)
Department of Education
- Supervisor: Dr.Â Hamish Chalmers
- Certificate in Teaching English as a Foreign Language (TEFL)
BA Language Sciences (17/20)
University of Lisbon (2017-2020)
Department of General & Romance Linguistics
- Areas of Specialization: Theoretical & Portuguese Linguistics
Erasmus+ Exchange Programme
Saarland University (2019-2020)
Department of Computational Linguistics
